oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1959-09-05 - Part 2 [transfer 1]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from September 5, 1959. Featuring Dave Overton (announcer), Marty Robbins (host/performer), guest performer Stonewall Jackson, and regular performers Archie Campbell, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, June Carter, and Stringbean. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1039th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: June Carter; Marty Robbins; Stonewall Jackson; Stringbean
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Dave Overton introduces June Carter -- Comedy routine (June Carter, Marty Robbins) -- The Proof Is In The Puffing (Marty Robbins) (recording) -- Dave Overton introduces Stonewall Jackson -- Life To Go (Stonewall Jackson) -- Dave Overton introduces Stringbean -- Going Down The Road Feeling Bad (Stringbean) -- Dave Overton introduces Marty Robbins -- Last Night About This Time (Marty Robbins) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Marty Robbins) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial -- Network announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); United States.
